thread.title: Phyllis Banks
thread.title_full: Goway Travel reviewed by Phyllis Banks

author: Phyllis Banks
title: Phyllis Banks
text:
From the minute I arrived at the Perth Airport I felt very comfortable with the limousine driver and the staff at the Hotel.
The time spent travelling around the Margaret River area was a great experience.From the caves,wineries ,sand dunes and sand boarding,pinnacles, Rottnest,I could not have asked for anything more exciting.
Who would ever think I fed kangaroos, touched a Koala and a Wombat.
Thank you Goway travel for your help in planning this wonderful vacation.
I would recommend it to all my friends.
Phyllis Banks
